hadiths.text: It was narrated from Anas that the Messenger of Allah said:"Whoever seeks reward for (the loss of) three of his own children, he will enter Paradise." A woman stood up and said: "Or two?" He said: "Or two." The woman said: "I wish that I had said, 'or one

chapter.ara-name: باب ثَوَابِ مَنِ احْتَسَبَ ثَلاَثَةً مِنْ صُلْبِهِ
chapter.eng-name: The Reward of one who seeks Reward for (The loss of) Three of his own Children
